---
title: "SWOT Analysis"
---

<br>

### Internal

#### Strengths

- Widely available materials for production
- Unique technology used
- Strong collaboration amongst a small

#### Weaknesses

- Narrow product range
- Inadequate supply chain
- Shortage of staff

<br>

### External

#### Opportunities

- Increased remuneration raises production rate and accessibility to consumers
- Rapidly increasing medical device industry
- Geographical expansion towards developing countries

#### Threats

- Limited range of brands leading to harsher brand competitions
- Narrow field of research
- Legal and regulatory issues
